name: Friedman Industries, Incorporated
description: Friedman Industries, Incorporated is a leading manufacturer and distributor of steel products and services, specializing in the production of steel plates and coils. Founded in 1965 and based in Longview, Texas, the company operates several manufacturing facilities and service centers across the United States. Friedman Industries is committed to providing high-quality steel products to various industries, including construction, transportation, and energy. The company offers a wide range of products, including hot-rolled and cold-rolled steel, as well as custom fabrication services to meet the specific needs of its clients. With a focus on sustainability, Friedman Industries actively seeks to minimize waste and maximize the efficiency of its operations. Its dedicated workforce, advanced manufacturing processes, and strong customer relationships position it as a reliable partner in the steel industry. The company is also involved in recycling operations, further enhancing its commitment to environmental stewardship. Friedman Industries continues to adapt to market demands, exploring innovative solutions and expanding its product lines to remain competitive in the evolving steel market.
